attributes.action: Diverting Overseas Aid to UK Flood Victims
attributes.additional_details:
Currently according to the Times in 2013, UK is providing £10 Billion in Overseas Aid.  One of those countries has its own Space Program! Others spen almost the same amout we give to them on their own Military Budget.

We the British People say NO MORE! We have our own need at this time with Hundreds upon Hundreds of people victims of Floods, who have lost almost all of their possessions, who are now homeless and in Dire Need of assistance.

Divert monies from the Overseas Aid Budget to help our fellow Britons get back on their feet, provide housing and basic needs NOW!

We the British People demand it!
